message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product. Given its unique value, I'm initially proposing a price of $22,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations, and I'm open to discussing this further. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but $22,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $15,000 for the product. Is this something you'd be willing to consider?

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While $22,000 might have been a bit high, I believe this product offers significant value beyond $15,000.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $18,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit shy of $18,500. Would you be willing to consider $17,000?
